q1: Did BVB Dortmund win the Bundesliga last year?
q2: What place did they come in?
a2: They did it in the second place
q3: Will they be in with a chance this year then ?
a3: BVB Dortmund always has a chance and they really deserve to win the title
q5: Will BVB ever return to their home town?
a5: Not wihtout a stadium and some cheerleaders.
